ul.li: Santa Clara Valley, California, United States

div.p: The Graphics Logic Designer will be responsible for delivering high-quality, low-power graphics IP that meets our performance, timing, and area goals. This individual will collaborate closely with the architecture team, functional verification team, and physical design teams.

ul.li: Data path and arithmetic design experience.
Graphics techniques such as such as filtering, mipmapping, compression, gamma, MSAA, dithering, and color spaces.
Experience with floating point design is a plus.
Expert knowledge of Verilog hardware description language.
Ability to work well in a team in order to be productive under aggressive product schedules.

div.p: Micro-architecture specification. Logic design. Simulation debug. Synthesis, timing analysis, and floor planning. Performance and power analysis.
MSEE preferred; or BSEE plus equivalent level of experience.
